title: sealinknetwork
author: sealinknetwork
created_time: December 14, 2023, 10:54:59 AMLast edit: December 14, 2023, 01:55:43 PM by sealinknetwork
content: Sealink NetworkLevel Up Virtual Private Networkcombine Pos and UPow blockchain technologies to create decentralization, free, secure virtual private network services [remote access, port mapping.]Mainnet will be launch at 17 Dec 2023 08:00 UTCWebsite: https://sealink.network/Source code: https://github.com/sealinknetworkDiscord: https://discord.com/invite/c7UyJkWBncTelegram: https://t.me/sealinknetworkBlock Explorer: https://explorer.sealink.network/Twitter: https://twitter.com/sealinknetworkCPU MININGSLK is a Pos, UPow coin with new network proof of Work algorithm [PoseidonHash] and has many advantages and has a smartnode in it.Is a platform to build Layer 1 consensus networks based on the Bitcoin protocol.NOT JUST A VIRTUAL PRIVATE NETWORKThe Future Virtual Private Network for BlockchainSealink is a blockchain platform, aiming to be the global standard for blockchain virtual private network and provide real value to everyone.LOOKING FORWARDHealthy Economic ModeIn the future, a virtual private network built by 500+ SmartNodes will provide free services to 100,000+ users, it's amazing! SmartNode need staked SLK to reward coins, while user need lock the coins to use the virtual private nework for free. When smartnode and user grow smooth,reward will be to balance,the network will be healthy and the coins will be useful!COIN DETAILS- Coin Symbol: SLK- Reward: 60 SLK- Max Supply: 210,000,000 SLK- Block Time: 1 Minute- Smartnode Collateral: 50,000 SLK- Free Connect: lock 1000 SLK2023-Q4 Roadmap1.launch the chain and genesis nodes2.grow the network 'smooth'3.deploy cpu miner   ✅4.deploy explorer   ✅5.deploy network monitoring dashboard   ✅6.deploy smart-node ✅7.whitepaper8.Announcement on bitcointalk9.deploy the web wallet10.listing the coin

comments.author: fahdbhatti
comments.body: Do you plan to implement GPU mining as well or it will strictly remain a CPU only coin?

comments.author: thikachhey
comments.body: Can you please elaborate what are the advantages of this PoseidonHash algorithm? Will it be CPU throughout or will GPU be added as well?

comments.author: Koriaz98
comments.body: Apparently its POS Algo Poseidonhash and UPow Sha-256 so not ASIC Resistant and just 15% reward for Pow mining.

comments.author: sealinknetwork
comments.body: The node tools testing has been completed on Windows and Linux. We are deploying the main network.

comments.author: Cynce
comments.body: Unless mainnet starts at zero, this is crap. You haven't published wallets or source, have a 50k requirement for a node, 60 unit reward, and 80% will go to MNs. The tokenomics look worse that ghostrider coins if you don't start publishing to that repo.

comments.author: sealinknetwork
comments.body: Mainnet has been launched. We are going to the next stop.https://github.com/sealinknetwork/Core

comments.author: sony87
comments.body: How to control the mining specs, select more cores etc, see mining speed etc ?How are people expected to make a node where 65k is needed and mining do very small ?Can we have external CPU miner where we can see the actual speed and specs of the mining ?Where in the config files we can add reliable peer list as it takes ages to find one initially ?
